full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGRA LHA MCHED DGU'I BSKANG GSO DNGOS GRUB 'GUGS PA'I LCAG KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES DGRA LHA MCHED DGU'I BSKANG GSO DNGOS GRUB 'GUGS PA'I LCAG KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DZA SAG THU RGYAL PO AA'I MAGI HO THOG GOD SNA TSE MOD SKYABS KYIS DPON MO AER TE NI T'A RA TSE DPAG SGRUBS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^RGYAL KHANG TSER ZHES 'BOD PA BLO BZANG BDE MCHOG SKYABS DPAL 'BYOR LHUN GRUB KYIS @006B SBYAR BA'O, ,YI GE PA NI BKA' DRIN 'GRAN ZLA MED PA NYID KYI SLOB DPON 'PHRIN LAS GRAGS PA PAS BRIS SO, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG BDE MCHOG SKYABS DPAL 'BYOR LHUN GRUB,
